about_the_game:
OMG everybody, aliens have invaded Earth! Towns, cities, deserts, they're everywhere. They're even at the Eiffel Tower if you can believe that! Somehow, as usual, Earth only has one person left capable of taking them on. Some kind of super soldier I suppose.

An intense twin stick shooter, blast your way around the world taking on countless hordes of enemies. Use bullet time to get out of sticky situations. Collect the power ups, but don't forget to keep an eye on your multiplier to get those massive scores!



  • 35 missions set at various real world locations and beyond
  • Bullet time to help out in those desperate situations
  • Mobotron, Alien Deathvaders & Berzerker Death Mob arcade modes!
  • Intense twin stick action
  • Loads of Power ups
  • Hordes of aliens to blast your way through

Alien Deathvaders

Repel ranks of enemies that advance in formation. Use your shields to protect you from the onslaught, and get the saucers for bonuses. Wave after wave of challenge in this tribute to a true arcade legend!

Berzerker Death Mob

Trapped in a robot filled maze, your only hope is to blast your way out. A futile aim but you might as well take as many of the evil robots with you as you can.

Mobotron

Based on the classic twin stick shooter that started it all. Fend off wave after wave of Hulks, Enforcers, Tanks, Brains & more. As well as the vaguely authentic Mobotron, you also get Mobotron+ which throws even more enemies at you!

name: Alien Death Mob

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2* 3000) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (256 MB) / Radeon HD 2400 PRO (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews:
“BEST TWIN-STICK SHOOTER YOU CAN GET FOR $2!!”
Retromation
short_description: Aliens have invaded Earth! Towns, cities, deserts, they're everywhere! Take on the role of Earth's last super soldier and confront the alien menace in this intense twin stick shooter!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Welsh
